list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Her show of friendship was (a) masquerade.

list_definition.definition: (with as) to pretend to be, usually intending to deceive

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The criminal was masquerading as a respectable businessman.
